alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 05 at 4:51AM PST until March 05 at 10:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Occasional snow. Gusty southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 50 mph. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, mostly falling this afternoon and evening, with localized amounts up to 8 inches. Plan on difficult travel conditions. * WHERE...Above 4000 feet. * WHEN...Until 10 PM today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for significant reductions in visibility at times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are occurring. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
